title: British Virgin Island Haven with Daily Breakfast, Daily US$100 Resort Credit & Airport Transfers
description:
Immerse yourself in the secluded luxury of Scrub Island, a private island sanctuary in the British Virgin Islands. Discover an opulent resort offering a world of lavish amenities, including a world-class marina, a tranquil spa and three private beaches. Jump into the lagoon-style pool and refresh your senses before heading to one of the exquisite onsite restaurants to indulge in island favourites and local flavours cooked to perfection.

Sip on refreshing cocktails at the swim-up pool bar or head to the beach for an array of water sports and outdoor activities like kayaking and more. Just a short boat ride away, explore the vibrant underwater world of the surrounding coral reefs or visit the charming local shops and eateries on Tortola.
offer_address: Scrub Island VG1120, British Virgin Islands
